definitions.definition: A person in the business or occupation of producing or distributing coal (any of several types of carbon fuel ).

subdefinitions.definition: A person who produces (e.g., digs, mines, gathers) or sells coal (the fossil fuel type), or transports it from underground, from the soil, or from a seashore.
A person in the business or occupation of producing (and selling) charcoal .

definitions.definition: A vessel carrying a bulk cargo of coal .
A sailor on such a vessel.

definitions.label_groups: slang , used by the traveller community

main_definition: A person in the business or occupation of producing or distributing coal (any of several types of carbon fuel ).
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) A vessel carrying a bulk cargo of coal .
( nautical ) A sailor on such a vessel.
( slang , used by the traveller community ) A non- traveller .
